parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma1

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Waypoints

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets the condition determining if the given waypoint is shown on the map view (for 3D HUD visibility see [[setWaypointVisible]]). Possible values are:
* "NEVER" - never show it
* "EASY" - show only if <tt>showCadetWP</tt> is enabled in global [[Arma 3: Difficulty Settings| difficulty]].
* "ALWAYS" - always show it

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> waypoint '''showWaypoint''' show

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> waypoint: [[Array]] - format [[Waypoint]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> show: [[String]] - see description

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[_grp, 2] [[showWaypoint]] "ALWAYS";</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[waypointShow]]
</value></part></template>
